name: FClothPhysicalMeshData
doc: Spatial simulation data for a mesh.

Indices: Indices of the simulation mesh triangles
InverseMasses: Inverse mass for each vertex in the physical mesh
SelfCollisionVertexSet: Valid indices to use for self collisions (reduced set of Indices)
MaxBoneWeights: Maximum number of bone weights of any vetex
NumFixedVerts: Number of fixed verts in the simulation mesh (fixed verts are just skinned and do not simulate)
